name: Dark Man Dude guy
description:
We recommend to play in full screen.

Controls:

A: move left

D: move right

space: jump

R: Restart

ESC: Pause

S: DO NOT PRESS S 

TIPS:

There are trick levels.

You can kill slimes and undescribable flying red creatures by jumping on their head.

You might kill a slime that also kills you simultaneously, we are aware of the problem.

If you press the main menu or quit the game your progress will not be saved.

You cannot kill the ghosts in the last 5 levels.
